about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Vinicius Machak Cabral, 20 years old, and I live in Salvador, Bahia. I'm currently studying Analysis and Development of Systems at IFBA. Every day, I strive to learn new technologies and develop valuable projects.
about.paragraph2: I've always been curious to understand how the systems and applications we use daily work, both their visual aspects and the logic behind them. This curiosity is what led me to the world of programming. Currently, I'm focused on full stack web development, with a preference for the backend, where I enjoy handling the business rules of applications.
about.paragraph3: A little more about me? I'm passionate about sports and play whenever possible. I enjoy listening to rock and R&B, as well as exploring new ideas and challenges. I'm curious, determined, and enjoy learning new things.
